attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe living legend Gavin Maclean should be awarded a knighthood.  Please sign this petition so that we may make the dream happen.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
